useCase.name: Collaboration and Feedback Process

preconditions.precondition: NSF Employee requests insights and research on users

successEndConditions.condition: Brand guidelines are communicated to NSF Employee

useCase.trigger: Design Team shares design directions and gathers feedback

mainSequence.step: User Research Team gathers and analyzes data
User Research Team provides user insights to Design Team
Design Team creates preliminary design directions
Stakeholders provide feedback on design concepts
Design Team refines design based on feedback
Design Team shares design directions and gathers feedback on Collaboration Platform
NSF Employee reviews design directions on Collaboration Platform
NSF Employee provides feedback on designs to Design Team
Design Team refines design based on feedback
Design Team establishes final brand guidelines
Brand Guidelines communicates brand guidelines to NSF Employee
NSF Employee refers to guidelines during project
